ctx: rewrite monoid_unit_l with (m := times) (u := zero) (x := x).
exceptions.tactic: apply monoid_unit_r with (m := times) (u := zero), x.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X M_sum : monoid_theory sum z sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v M_times : monoid_theory times o distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x x : X Unable to unify "?M1461 ⊗ z = ?M1461" with "z = x".

original: rewrite monoid_unit_l with (m := times) (u := zero) (x := x). symmetry. apply monoid_unit_r with (m := times) (u := zero), x.
